About

Just little of me

Highly skilled and knowledgeable front-end developer with 10+ years of experience developing and creating the best user experience using HTML5, CSS3-SASS, CSS animations, JavaScript (JS ES6 and React), and UX/UI best practices (Photoshop, Balsamiq, Figma, and sketch). Extensive experience leading TFS, Jira, Trello, and Redmine teams. Strong problem-solving, organization, and analytical skills. Proficiency in Scrum and Kanban Methodologies. Fluency in English and Portuguese.
